alert.note: Alert for Laurel (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 02 at 3:45AM EST until February 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain changing to sleet and snow. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch possible. Total snow and sleet accumulation up to one half inch. * WHERE...Laurel County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice accumulation from freezing rain. The hazardous conditions could also lead to slippery road conditions from Thursday evening through the Friday morning commute. Plan on difficult to nearly impossible travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
